mapper.insert: insert into users(user_id, user_email, user_password) values ((select nvl(max(user_id), 0) + 1 from users), #{user_email}, #{user_password})
insert into user_info values ((select nvl(max(user_id), 0) + 1 from user_info), #{user_name}, #{user_tel}, #{user_address}, #{user_profile}, #{original_file}, #{point}, #{user_id})
mapper.select: select u.*, r.role_value as auth from users u join role r on u.role_id = r.role_id where u.user_email = #{username}
select user_name, a.user_id from user_info a join users b on role_id = 2 and a.user_id = b.user_id
